subject: Steve's Box #20 on EBAY
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:

--part1_470a0.1fc9dd61.396bc8f3_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I've been getting a lot of emails for boxes, so i figured the only fair way 
 was to make an auction for one.  This is the last of my radios for now, so 
 get it while you can.  My radios have been tested in the field with a lot  
of positive feedback.  Any questions, feel free to e-mail me.  I've  
attached audio as well.
 
Thanx,
-Steve
 
_http://cgi.ebay.com/Steves-Ghost-Box-20-Prototype-Model-RTSC-EVP-/140426520
914?cmd=ViewItem&pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item20b212a952_ 
(http://cgi.ebay.com/Steves-Ghost-Box-20-Prototype-Model-RTSC-EVP-/140426520914?cmd=ViewItem
&pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item20b212a952) 
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/) 
_http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/_ 
(http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/) 
_www.stevehultay.com_ (http://www.stevehultay.com/) 
_www.rtscresearch.org_ (http://www.rtscresearch.org/)
